statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT sender, recipient, timestamp, message FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, recipient, message, timestamp, sender FROM communication_logs;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE recipient = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender, recipient, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Bob' AND recipient = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sender, COUNT(*) as num_messages FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender ORDER BY num_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender, recipient FROM communication_logs WHERE sender != recipient ORDER BY sender, recipient;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs_relief_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, communication_date FROM CommunicationLogs_relief_agencies;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE id = 5;
SELECT entity_name, message_text FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE communication_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT id, agency_name, entity_name, communication_date, message_text FROM CommunicationLogs_relief_agencies, CommunicationLogs_government_entities;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs_relief_agencies ORDER BY communication_date DESC, agency_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agency_name, communication_date FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT id, agency_name, message_text FROM CommunicationLogs_relief_agencies WHERE agency_name LIKE '%Red Cross%' OR message_text LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE entity_name = 'FEMA' AND communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_communications, DATE(communication_date) AS date FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities GROUP BY DATE(communication_date) ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content FROM communication_logs WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT timestamp, content FROM communication_logs WHERE government_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM relief_agencies WHERE contact_person = 'John Smith';
SELECT government_name FROM government_entities WHERE government_type = 'Federal';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE agency_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT content FROM communication_logs WHERE government_id = 3 AND community_id = 5;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM relief_agencies WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT government_name, government_type FROM government_entities WHERE government_type = 'Federal';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE agency_id = 4 AND government_id = 2 AND community_id = 6 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, sender_name, receiver_name, message FROM communication_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM government_entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM relief_agencies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, count(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender_name, receiver_name HAVING count(*) > 3 ORDER BY sender_name ASC;
SELECT agency_name, phone_number FROM relief_agencies WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT agency_id FROM government_entities) ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT entity_name, contact_person, email FROM government_entities WHERE email LIKE '%gov%' ORDER BY entity_name;
SELECT community_name, location, population FROM affected_communities ORDER BY population DESC, community_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM relief_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, contact_person, contact_email FROM government_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Government';
SELECT community_name, location, needs FROM affected_communities WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender='Alice';
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT agency_name, entity_name, community_name FROM relief_agencies INNER JOIN collaborations ON relief_agencies.agency_id = collaborations.agency_id INNER JOIN government_entities ON government_entities.entity_id = collaborations.entity_id INNER JOIN affected_communities ON affected_communities.community_id = collaborations.community_id;
SELECT contact_person, contact_email FROM government_entities WHERE entity_type='Humanitarian';
